summary: Hatch gets a special resuscitative medicine after "dying" in a car accident. His wife and daughter only get minor injuries. He gets strange nightmares such as killing a teen girl. Is it just dreams?
cast: Jeff Goldblum|Christine Lahti|Alicia Silverstone|Jeremy Sisto|Alfred Molina|Rae Dawn Chong|Kenneth Welsh|Suzy Joachim|Shirley Broderick|Tom McBeath|Joely Collins|Roger Cross|Michael McDonald|Don S. Davis|Rebecca Toolan|Hiro Kanagawa|Jayme Knox|Norma Jean Wick|Michelle Skalnik|Gaetana Korbin|Tiffany Foster|Mara Duronslet|Iris Quinn|Natasha Morley|Sarah Strange
title: Asesino del más allá
